properties.name: composed-task-arguments
properties.description: The arguments to be used for each of the tasks.

properties.name: composed-task-properties
properties.description: The properties to be used for each of the tasks as well as their deployments.

properties.name: dataflow-server-access-token
properties.description: The optional OAuth2 Access Token.

properties.name: dataflow-server-password
properties.description: The optional password for the dataflow server that will receive task launch requests. Used to access the the dataflow server using Basic Authentication. Not used if dataflowServerAccessToken is set.

properties.name: dataflow-server-uri
properties.description: The URI for the dataflow server that will receive task launch requests. Default is http://localhost:9393;

properties.name: dataflow-server-username
properties.description: The optional username for the dataflow server that will receive task launch requests. Used to access the the dataflow server using Basic Authentication. Not used if dataflowServerAccessToken is set.

properties.name: increment-instance-enabled
properties.description: Allows a single ComposedTaskRunner instance to be re-executed without changing the parameters using a incremented id from previous execution. Default is true.

properties.name: uuid-instance-enabled
properties.description: Allows a single ComposedTaskRunner instance to be re-executed without changing the parameters using a UUID for each launch. Default is false.  If set to true it overrides increment-instance-enabled property.

properties.name: interval-time-between-checks
properties.description: The amount of time in millis that the ComposedTaskRunner will wait between checks of the database to see if a task has completed.

properties.name: max-wait-time
properties.description: The maximum amount of time in millis that a individual step can run before the execution of the Composed task is failed.

properties.name: oauth2-client-credentials-client-id
properties.description: The OAuth2 Client Id (Used for the client credentials grant). If not null, then the following properties are ignored: dataflowServerUsername, dataflowServerPassword, dataflowServerAccessToken

properties.name: oauth2-client-credentials-client-secret
properties.description: The OAuth2 Client Secret (Used for the client credentials grant).

properties.name: oauth2-client-credentials-scopes
properties.description: OAuth2 Authorization scopes (Used for the client credentials grant).

properties.name: oauth2-client-credentials-token-uri
properties.description: Token URI for the OAuth2 provider (Used for the client credentials grant).

properties.name: platform-name
properties.description: The platform property that will be used for each task in the workflow when it is launched.

properties.name: transaction-isolation-level
properties.description: Establish the transaction isolation level for the Composed Task Runner.  Default is ISOLATION_REPEATABLE_READ

properties.name: skip-tls-certificate-verification
properties.description: If true skips SSL certificate validation for SCDF server communication.

properties.name: split-thread-allow-core-thread-timeout
properties.description: Specifies whether to allow split core threads to timeout. Default is false;

properties.name: split-thread-core-pool-size
properties.description: Split's core pool size. Default is 4;

properties.name: split-thread-keep-alive-seconds
properties.description: Split's thread keep alive seconds. Default is 60.

properties.name: split-thread-max-pool-size
properties.description: Split's maximum pool size. Default is Integer.MAX_VALUE.

properties.name: split-thread-queue-capacity
properties.description: Capacity for Split's  BlockingQueue. Default is Integer.MAX_VALUE.

properties.name: split-thread-wait-for-tasks-to-complete-on-shutdown
properties.description: Whether to wait for scheduled tasks to complete on shutdown, not interrupting running tasks and executing all tasks in the queue. Default is false;
